page.title: Contact

hero.headline: Inquiries & Estimates
hero.textline: Get in touch with Trim Tile and Stone

blocks.content:
## Phone ðŸ“²

You can get a hold of us during business hours by calling owner Elsian (most people call me **Melsi**) Hoxha at **(226) 450-1671**. Please leave a message if nobody answersâ€”we're probably in the middle of a job.

## Contact Form ðŸ“¬

You can also send us a message letting us know how we can contact you, the services you are interested in, and how we can help you. General inquiries are welcome!

***
